column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=On the role of religion in the Presidential race
#Text=Brownback reading to children at the Via Christi Family Practice Clinic .
#Text=Evangelical candidates have n't fared particularly well in this primary season .
#Text=What do you think is the reason for that ?
#Text=I do n't know .
#Text=I 'm baffled by that myself .
#Text=We have n't been able to raise money .
#Text=But you would think we should be able to do that .
#Text=If you look at both Mike Huckabee and myself in particular .
#Text=I 've had some difficulty based on the immigration issue , because I 've supported a guest worker program .
#Text=I think it 's part of looking at every human as having dignity .

#Text=We should try to enforce the laws , and we should enforce the laws and build a fence on the border , but at the same time see every person as a beautiful person created in the image of God , and that 's been a very tough topic on our side of the aisle .
#Text=Why we have n't gotten more traction , I do n't know .
#Text=The Democrats often have concerns about the electability of their candidates ; Hillary Clinton , for example .
#Text=Do you think that it might scare some people that in this point in time that Evangelicals are n't particularly electable ?
#Text=Oh , I suppose it could be .
#Text=I suppose it actually applies in reverse more , in that the reason why Rudy Giuliani is getting support is because of 9/11 and he is seen as the most likely person able to beat Hillary .
#Text=I think it probably applies to that setting more than not seeing an Evangelical as electable , because George Bush I think would generally be seen in that category and was elected twice .
#Text=Do you think Mitt Romney 's Mormonism is an issue that people should take into consideration ?
#Text=I do n’t .
#Text=There 's no religious test for public office in this country .
#Text=There should n't be .
#Text=I think people should run on who they are and their record , and there I think he has a challenge , based on his record .
#Text=But his faith should not be an issue .
#Text=What if someone was a Zoroastrian ?
#Text=Well , let 's see what their policies are .
#Text=Uhh --
#Text=Or a Satanist .
#Text=Let 's see what their policies are .
#Text=Really ?
#Text=There 's not a religious test in this country , and let 's see what their policies are .
#Text=Even though religious beliefs are so fundamental to a person ?
#Text=It 's more of a policy issue than it is a faith issue ?
#Text=I think you 'll see a person by what they produce , in their fruit , if you 'll let me use that religious phrase .
#Text=I think you 'll know a person by their fruit .

#Text=And that 's what I think you 'll see more coming through in people , and that that 's what you should look for , and that 's , I think , an observable -- about how they live their own life , about what policies they advocate , about what are their priorities .
